special_text:
Whenever you activate one of Hieronymus Scratch's loyalty abilities, return up to one card from your graveyard to your hand.
[+1]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token.
[-2]: You may pay 2 life. If you do, each opponent loses 5 life.
[-4]: You may sacrifice a land. If you do, you may cast a card from your hand without paying its mana cost.
